mapper.sql: id, video_title, speaker_id, course_id, video_length, video_image_url, video_url, video_descr, insert_time, update_time, video_play_times
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from video
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into video (id, video_title, speaker_id, course_id, video_length, video_image_url, video_url, video_descr, insert_time, update_time, video_play_times) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{videoTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{speakerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{courseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{videoLength,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{videoImageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{videoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{videoDescr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{videoPlayTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER})

video_title,

course_id,

video_image_url,
video_url,
video_descr,

video_play_times,

mapper.update:
update video
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
video_title = #{record.videoTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
speaker_id = #{record.speakerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
course_id = #{record.courseId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
video_length = #{record.videoLength,jdbcType=INTEGER},
video_image_url = #{record.videoImageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
video_url = #{record.videoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update_time = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
video_play_times = #{record.videoPlayTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update video set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, video_title = #{record.videoTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, speaker_id = #{record.speakerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, course_id = #{record.courseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, video_length = #{record.videoLength,jdbcType=INTEGER}, video_image_url = #{record.videoImageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, video_url = #{record.videoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, video_descr = #{record.videoDescr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, insert_time = #{record.insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, video_play_times = #{record.videoPlayTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update video
video_title = #{videoTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
speaker_id = #{speakerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
course_id = #{courseId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
video_length = #{videoLength,jdbcType=INTEGER},
video_image_url = #{videoImageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
video_url = #{videoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
video_descr = #{videoDescr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
insert_time = #{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
video_play_times = #{videoPlayTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update video set video_title = #{videoTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, speaker_id = #{speakerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, course_id = #{courseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, video_length = #{videoLength,jdbcType=INTEGER}, video_image_url = #{videoImageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, video_url = #{videoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, video_descr = #{videoDescr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, insert_time = #{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, video_play_times = #{videoPlayTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select v.*,s.speaker_name,c.course_name from video v left join speaker s on v.speaker_id=s.id left join course c on v.course_id=c.id where v.video_title like '%' #{title} '%' and s.speaker_name like '%' #{speaker} '%' and c.course_name like '%' #{course} '%' limit #{page},5

select count(1) from video v left join speaker s on v.speaker_id=s.id left join course c on v.course_id=c.id where v.video_title like '%' #{title} '%' and s.speaker_name like '%' #{speaker} '%' and c.course_name like '%' #{course} '%'
mapper.delete: delete from video where id in (${ids})
